inclusion.criterion: first time surgery for proven papillary thyroid cancer > 10 mm
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: first time surgery for a cytologic diagnosis of follicular neoplasia or suspected (not proven) malignancy
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Inability to understand written and oral information or to comply with scheduled follow-up
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has metastatic papillary thyroid cancer, underwent XRT for neck mass, and has poor oral intake and weight loss.
